channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 澳大利亚法院判定墨尔本男子犯有外国干涉罪
item.description: An Australia court on Tuesday found a Melbourne man who held prominent positions in Chinese community associations guilty of planning an act of foreign interference, the first verdict of its kind under a law introduced in 2018.翻译:澳大利亚一家法院周二判定一名在华人社区协会中担任要职的墨尔本男子犯有策划外国干涉罪，这是根据 2018 年出台的法律做出的首个此类判决。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 全球10大钢铁企业
item.description: Japan's Nippon Steel clinched a deal on Monday to buy U.S. Steel for $14.9 billion in cash.翻译:日本新日铁周一达成协议，将以 149 亿美元现金收购美国钢铁公司。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 投资者在 12 月份抛售现金，购买股票 - 美银美林
item.description: Investors turned more bullish in December, buying stocks and reducing cash holdings on expectations the U.S. Federal Reserve has finished hiking rates and the global economy will avoid a big recession, a BofA fund manager survey showed on Tuesday.翻译:美国银行基金经理周二的一项调查显示，由于预期美联储已完成加息且全球经济将避免大衰退，投资者在 12 月份变得更加看涨，购买股票并减少现金持有量。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 不太甜：随着种植减少，印度可能需要进口糖
item.description: India's sugar output this crop year, hit by weak rains, is set to lag consumption for the first time in seven years, according to traders and a survey of farmers, and lower plantings may even force the world's No.2 producer to import in the following year.翻译:根据贸易商和对农民的调查，印度本年度的食糖产量受到降雨量不足的影响，七年来首次落后于消费，而播种面积的减少甚至可能迫使世界第二大生产国从印度进口食糖。下一年。
item.author: Rajendra Jadhav

item.title: 美国暂停制裁后，中化集团购买稀有的委内瑞拉石油船货--消息人士
item.description: China's Sinochem Corp has bought a million barrels of Venezuelan crude oil for arrival in December, a rare purchase as the state oil and chemicals group capitalises on Washington's suspension of sanctions on the South American producer.翻译:中国中化集团公司已购买了100万桶委内瑞拉原油，将于12月抵达，这在这家国有石油和化工集团利用华盛顿暂停对这家南美生产商实施制裁的机会之际进行了罕见的购买。
item.author: Chen Aizhu, Florence Tan

item.title: 香港民主人士黎智英的安全审判面临外交压力
item.description: International pressure was building over a landmark national security trial in Hong Kong for leading China critic Jimmy Lai, with British authorities calling for consular access to the jailed democrat as his trial entered its second day on Tuesday.翻译:国际压力正在因香港对中国主要批评者黎智英进行的具有里程碑意义的国家安全审判而增加，随着周二审判进入第二天，英国当局要求领事探视这位被监禁的民主党人。
item.author: James Pomfret, Jessie Pang

item.title: 抛开紧张局势，台湾总统在致命地震后向中国提供援助
item.description: Taiwan President Tsai Ing-wen expressed condolences to China on Tuesday and offered her government's help after an earthquake killed more than 100 people on the northern edge of the Qinghai-Tibetan plateau.翻译:青藏高原北部边缘发生地震，造成100多人死亡，台湾总统蔡英文周二向中国表示哀悼，并向中国政府提供帮助。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 菲律宾总统称与中国的外交努力“走向糟糕”
item.description: Philippines President Ferdinand Marcos Jr. said a "paradigm shift" was needed in how his country approaches the South China Sea issue, as diplomatic efforts with Beijing were headed "in a poor direction".翻译:菲律宾总统小费迪南德·马科斯表示，菲律宾处理南海问题的方式需要“范式转​​变”，因为与北京的外交努力“朝着糟糕的方向发展”。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 台湾报告另一个疑似中国气象气球穿越台湾海峡
item.description: A suspected Chinese weather balloon flew across the sensitive Taiwan Strait on Monday but stayed well north of Taiwan, the island's defence ministry said on Tuesday, the third time this month Taipei has reported them nearby.翻译:台湾国防部周二表示，一个疑似中国气象气球周一飞越敏感的台湾海峡，但仍停留在台湾以北的地方，这是本月台北第三次报告称气球在附近。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 2024年中国经济能否重回正轨？
item.description: China's disappointing post-COVID recovery has raised significant doubts about the foundations of its decades of stunning growth and presented Beijing with a tough choice for 2024 and beyond: take on more debt or grow less.翻译:中国在新冠疫情后令人失望的复苏让人对其数十年惊人增长的基础产生了重大怀疑，并给北京带来了2024年及以后的艰难选择：承担更多债务还是减少增长。
item.author: Marius Zaharia

item.title: 曼钦寻求撤销财政部允许部分中国矿物用于电动汽车的豁免
item.description: The chair of the Senate Energy and Natural Resources Committee wants Congress to vote on reversing the Treasury Department's electric vehicle tax credit guidance, saying it will increase U.S. reliance on China.翻译:参议院能源和自然资源委员会主席希望国会投票推翻财政部的电动汽车税收抵免指导，称这将增加美国对中国的依赖。
item.author: David Shepardson

item.title: 立法者希望拜登拒绝向中国无人机制造商大疆创新颁发出口许可证
item.description: A group of 15 Republican lawmakers Monday asked the Pentagon to block export licenses for U.S. components for Chinese-drone manufacturer DJI, citing national security concerns.翻译:周一，由 15 名共和党议员组成的小组以国家安全为由，要求五角大楼阻止向中国无人机制造商大疆创新发放美国零部件的出口许可证。
item.author: David Shepardson

item.title: Forvia 计划在 AI-CEO 的帮助下，到 2028 年将研发成本减半
item.description: French car parts maker Forvia wants to cut its Research and development (R&D) costs by half by 2028 thanks mainly to generative artificial intelligence (AI) to keep up with electrification challenges and Asian competition in the automotive industry.翻译:法国汽车零部件制造商 Forvia 希望到 2028 年将其研发 (R&D) 成本削减一半，主要依靠生成人工智能 (AI)，以应对电气化挑战和亚洲汽车行业的竞争。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国甘肃农村地震造成100多人死亡，房屋倒塌
item.description: A magnitude-6.2 earthquake struck one of China's poorest regions just before midnight on Monday, killing at least 127 people, injuring hundreds and bringing down mud houses in remote villages that never stood a chance.翻译:周一午夜前，中国最贫困地区之一发生里氏6.2级地震，造成至少127人死亡、数百人受伤，偏远村庄的泥屋也被夷为平地。
item.author: Liz Lee, Qiaoyi Li, Ryan Woo

item.title: 德国央行发现德国企业对中国的担忧推高了成本
item.description: Years of effort by German companies to diversify their supply chains is pushing up costs and further increases are still in the pipeline, especially for firms with ties to China, the Bundesbank said on Monday after surveying 8400 businesses.翻译:德国央行在对 8400 家企业进行调查后周一表示，德国企业多年来为实现供应链多元化所做的努力正在推高成本，而且进一步的上涨仍在酝酿之中，尤其是与中国有联系的企业。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国蔚来汽车将获得阿布扎比 CYVN 22 亿美元投资
item.description: Electric vehicle maker Nio has signed a pact for an investment of $2.2 billion from CYVN Holdings, an investment vehicle based in Abu Dhabi, the Chinese company said on Monday.翻译:电动汽车制造商蔚来汽车周一表示，该公司已与总部位于阿布扎比的投资机构 CYVN Holdings 签署了 22 亿美元的投资协议。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 随着消费者违约率上升，中国银行加大不良贷款销售力度
item.description: Chinese banks are putting bad loans up for sale at a record pace, as regulators push for faster disposal of sour debts amid rising consumer defaults during an ailing post-COVID economic recovery.翻译:在新冠疫情后经济复苏不佳期间，消费者违约率不断上升，监管机构推动加快处置不良债务，中国的银行正以创纪录的速度出售不良贷款。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 北方深冻，南方罕见降雪
item.description: The cold weather sweeping China brought rare snowfall on Monday as far south as the province of Guangdong, while temperatures in the chilly north plunged to near historic lows for the month.翻译:周一，席卷中国的寒冷天气给南部广东省带来了罕见的降雪，而寒冷的北方气温则跌至接近本月历史最低水平。
item.author: Liz Lee, Ryan Woo

item.title: 中国与朝鲜在导弹发射期间举行高层会晤
item.description: China's Foreign Minister Wang Yi held talks with a senior North Korean official in Beijing on Monday, coinciding with Pyongyang's launch of a missile capable of reaching anywhere in the United States.翻译:中国外交部长王毅周一在北京与朝鲜高级官员举行会谈，恰逢平壤发射了一枚能够到达美国任何地方的导弹。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 官员称2024年中国经济状况将改善
item.description: China's economy is expected to see more favourable conditions and more opportunities than challenges in 2024, state media said citing officials of the Chinese Communist Party's finance and economy office.翻译:官方媒体援引中共中央财经办公室官员的话称，预计2024年中国经济将面临更多有利条件、机遇多于挑战。
item.author: Reuters
